trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 호스트 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewButtonColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewButtonColumn 클래스는 특수 한 유형의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>논리적으로 호스트 하는 데 사용 되는 클래스 단순 사용자 입력에 응답 하는 셀.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewButtonColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewButtonColumn에는 연결 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>과 교차 하는 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 비슷한 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)를 제공 하는 각 셀을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To display the same button text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired button text.
trans-unit.target: 모든 셀에 대해 동일한 단추 텍스트를 표시 하려면 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>속성을 `true` 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>속성을 원하는 단추 텍스트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열 형식에 대 한 기본 정렬 모드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user button clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 단추 클릭에 응답 하려면 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기를 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 클릭 단추 열에서 발생 했는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 클릭 하 고 열 머리글에 없는 단추 셀에서 발생 한 것인지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, and cell styles specified through properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 단추 열의 단추를 사용 하 여 칠해집니다 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>와 같은 속성을 통해 지정 된 셀 스타일 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>영향을 주지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref> 클래스를 기본 상태로 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 다음 속성을 설정 하 여 열을 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성에서 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>속성입니다. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 새 셀을 만드는 데 사용 되는 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>클래스에서이 속성에 새로 만든된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> 을 초기화</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> 하는 것에 대 한 생성자

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 셀 서식 파일의 속성 변경 즉시 영향을 주지 것입니다 열의 기존 셀의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI).

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 열 다시 생성 한 후 이러한 변경 된 것만 (예를 들어 열 정렬 이나 호출을 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 있는 다른 열의 모든 셀에는 다음에 모델링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property could not be cast to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 값이이 속성을 설정 하지으로 캐스팅할 수는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 이 칼럼의 정확한 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of button cells.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 단추 셀의 열을 복제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복제 된 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 열의 기본 셀 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>이 속성에서 반환 속성에 초기 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>속성 값이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 값에 지정 된 값을 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤과 같지만 다른 셀 스타일 속성에 의해 재정의 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 셀 스타일](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer> and cell styles specified through properties such as DefaultCellStyle have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 단추 열의 단추를 사용 하 여 칠해집니다 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>DefaultCellStyle 같은 속성을 통해 지정 된 셀 스타일 해도 영향을 미치지.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 기본 스타일으로 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 열에서 단추 셀의 평면 스타일 모양을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: FlatStyle 속성 열에 있는 셀의 모양을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>열거형.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> 열에 있는 단추의 모양을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
trans-unit.target: 단추 셀에 표시 되는 기본 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> contained in the column that has as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property value of `true` displays the Text property value on the cell's button.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>인 열에 포함 된 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>속성 값이 `true` 셀의 단추 텍스트 속성 값을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: If there is an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, changing this property refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤,이 속성을 변경 열 표시를 새로 고칩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>텍스트가 들어 있는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 설정할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 열을 설명 하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>열을 설명 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>속성 값이이 열에 있는 셀의 단추 텍스트로 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>단추 셀 단추 텍스트로 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The UseColumnTextForButtonValue property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property value for all of the button cells.
trans-unit.target: UseColumnTextForButtonValue 속성을 사용 하면 각 셀에 대 한 단추 텍스트를 설정 하거나 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>단추 셀에 대 한 속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed on buttons in the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <> </> *> 속성 값을 열의; 단추에 표시 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <> </> *> 각 셀의 속성 값은 해당 단추에 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>
